keyPolicies.policyDescription: The number of people on Job Seeker's Allowance in Middlesbrough fell by a third last year but there's more to do.
Middlesbrough is one of only 13 places where children have a less than 50% chance of going to a good secondary school.
Middlesbrough has some of the worst crime in the country - fuelled by problems like addiction.

issues.economy: The number of people on Job Seeker's Allowance in Middlesbrough fell by a third last year.
